response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its value and quality, I understand it might seem quite an investment. However, considering its worth to you, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a significant saving compared to the market value. I trust this opportunity will not only meet but exceed your expectations. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12000}
